mapper.select: select hr_bas_staff_post.yggh from hr_bas_staff_post where hr_bas_staff_post.zzbz = #{zzbz} and rglx = #{rglx}
select * from hr_bas_staff_post as a where rgrq = (select max(b.rgrq) from hr_bas_staff_post as b where b.yggh = #{yggh}) and yggh=#{yggh}
select * from hr_bas_staff_post as a where rgrq <= #{ed} and (lgrq is null or lgrq = '0000-00-00 00:00:00' or lgrq>= #{fd}) and yggh=#{yggh}

select a.*,base.GWMC,s.ygxm,org.ZZMC from hr_bas_staff_post as a left join hr_bas_post base on a.GWBZ = base.GWBZ left join hr_bas_staff s on a.yggh=s.yggh left JOIN hr_bas_organization org on a.ZZBZ =org.ZZBZ where a.yggh=#{yggh} and rgrq = (select max(bs.rgrq) from hr_bas_staff_post as bs where bs.yggh = #{yggh})
